author: Al Jazeera
title: WHO warns malaria deaths in Africa could double amid pandemic
description: Top health officials urge countries to ensure essential malaria prevention work continues during coronavirus pandemic.
content:
The World Health Organisation (WHO) has warned that the number of deaths caused by malaria in sub-Saharan Africa could double to 769,000, as efforts to tackle the disease face disruptions by the coronavirus pandemic.
